name: Monopoly
description: Monopoly is a board game currently published by Hasbro. In the game, players roll two six-sided dice to move around the game board, buying and trading properties, and developing them with houses and hotels.

name: Poker
description: Poker is a game which people play with a normal set (or deck) of 52 cards.

name: Catan
description: The Settlers of Catan from Mayfair Games is an award-winning strategy game.

name: Risk
description: Risk is a strategy board game of diplomacy, conflict and conquest for two to six players.
